docs.title: Andre's Add-ons
docs.text:
Welcome to my Add-ons page!

On this page can you find all the Add-ons I offer for ItemsAdder and CosmeticsCore.

docs.title: CosmeticsCore Add-ons
docs.text:
Welcome to my CosmeticsCore Add-ons page!

This page lists all Add-ons I offer for the Premium Plugin CosmeticsCore.

docs.title: CCVanilla UI
docs.text:
Statistics

Hat Items: None Body Items: None Balloon Items: None

Standalone version: ItemsAdder version:

Source Code: https://github.com/Andre601/CCVanillaUI

Download: https://github.com/Andre601/CCVanillaUI/releases

This add-on doesn't add any cosmetics. Instead does it replace the GUIs and cursor icons of the plugin with more vanilla-like ones.

docs.title: Foxcosmetics
docs.text:
Statistics

Hat Items: 2 Body Items: 2 Balloon Items: None

Standalone version: ItemsAdder version:

Source Code: https://github.com/Andre601/Foxcosmetics

Download: https://github.com/Andre601/Foxcosmetics/releases

This small cosmetics add-on adds fox ears and tails that you can wear. They mimic the vanilla fox textures are closely as possible.

docs.title: Hats
docs.text: Show/Hide Hat Items CosmeticsCore Name ItemsAdder Name Vanilla Item fox_ears foxcosmetics:fox_ears iron_horse_armor:400001 snow_fox_ears foxcosmetics:snow_fox_ears iron_horse_armor:400002

docs.title: Body
docs.text: Show/Hide Body Items CosmeticsCore Name ItemsAdder Name Vanilla Item fox_tail foxcosmetics:fox_tail iron_horse_armor:400003 fox_tail (Self) foxcosmetics:fox_tail_self iron_horse_armor:400005 snow_fox_tail foxcosmetics:snow_fox_tail iron_horse_armor:400004 snow_fox_tail (Self) foxcosmetics:snow_fox_tail_self iron_horse_armor:400006

docs.title: ItemsAdder Add-ons
docs.text:
Welcome to my ItemsAdder Add-ons page!

This page lists all Add-ons I offer for the Premium Plugin ItemsAdder.

docs.title: IA Vanilla UI
docs.text: Replaces the /ia UIs with ones that mimic the vanilla GUI design.

docs.title: MC Computer Icons
docs.text: MC Computer Icons adds 16x16 items displaying computer related icons with a Minecraft GUI-like design.

docs.title: Robot Entity
docs.text: A simple add-on that adds a robot entity with multiple animations available. It's recommended to use it on a Citizens NPC to avoid random movement.

docs.title: Vanilla MC UIs
docs.text:
This add-on adds hundreds of items and a lot of custom font images to allow you recreating vanilla GUIs like furnaces, crafting tables, etc. without the need to use NMS code to access those. Useful for people who don't have programming experience but want to display recipes and alike.

Add-on comes with examples usable in DeluxeMenus.
